lines.text: Money can't buy happiness! Only POWER can do that!
Doubts are about the only certainties I have right now, yes.
It may not be the best of all possible worlds, but it's the only damn one we've got.
So don't make waves. Because unlike Jesus, we can't walk on them.
Oh and by the way, I think I love you. Do you mind?
If God had not intended for some people to be poor, then He would not have had The Bible published in paperback.
